roll_desc: If you see only Chians
text: Zeus will give good thinking to your mind, stranger:
he will grant happiness to your work,
for which you will give thanks. But appease Aphrodite and
the son of Maia.

roll_desc: If four Chians and one three are cast, the god signals
text: By avoiding enmity and animosity, you will reach your prize;
you will arrive and the blue-eyed goddess Athena will save
you. The activity that you have in mind will turn out as
you wish it.

roll_desc: If one four and four Chians in a row are cast
text: Don’t do the business that you are engaged in; it will not turn out
well. It will be difficult and impossible around someone
who tires himself out. But if you go abroad for some time,
no harm will come from it.

roll_desc: If two threes and three Chians are cast
text: A high flying eagle on the right-hand side of the traveller will be a good omen;
with the help of Greatest Zeus (Zeus Megistos), you will
achieve your goal; do not fear.

roll_desc: If one six and four Chians in a row
text: It will be better to fulfill whatever vow you made to the daimôn, if you intend
to perform what you ponder in your mind. Demeter and Zeus will save you.

roll_desc: If three are Chians, one a four and the fifth a three
text: Do not do the business you are about to do; as for the very
intention you have, the gods are restraining it, but they
will free you from your toil and no harm will meet you.

roll_desc: If three threes are cast, and further two Chians
text: You will make gains; you will take what you wish, and you will achieve
everything; the daimôn will make you honored, and you
will overcome your enemies; the plan that you are about
to realize will be according to your desire.

roll_desc: If two fours and three Chians in a row are cast
text: Do all your business, because it will turn out well. The gods will
save him who is ill from his bed; also the god announces
that he who is in another country will return home.

roll_desc: If one four, two Chians and two threes are cast
text: A storm will come about your business, but it will turn out well;
also the god announces that he will free the one who is ill
from his suffering; and the gods will bring safely home
the one who is abroad.

roll_desc: Three Chians, a six, and the fifth throw a three
text: Do not yet make haste to go; it is impossible to go, rather wait; if
you set out to rush mindlessly, you will do great damage to
yourself, but if you wait, blameless time will accomplish
everything.

roll_desc: Three Chians and a six and the fifth a four
text: Sail wherever you wish; you will return full of joy, for you have found and
accomplished everything that you ponder in your mind;
but pray to Aphrodite and the son of Maia (Hermes).

roll_desc: If one Chian and four threes are cast
text: You are fit for every business and ready for any undertaking. The gods
will easily save him who is ill, and all will be well as to
the other oracles.

roll_desc: [The first two lines are lost]
text: [–––] and impossible [–––]; the god does not allow the plan
that you follow, thus wait: it is terrible to walk into enmity,
competition and a trial.

roll_desc: One Chian, three threes, and one four: The god announces
text: You kick against the goad, you struggle against the waves,
you search for a fish in the sea: do not hasten to do business.
It does not help you to force the gods at the wrong time.

roll_desc: One six, two Chians, and a pair of threes
text: Do not project terrible things, and do not pray for what is against the
gods, thinking terrible thoughts. There will accrue no
gain from it, and no reward will come from this path you
are walking.

roll_desc: If three fours and two ones are cast
text: The daimôn will lead you on the way that you undertake, and the lover of smiling,
Aphrodite, will lead you toward good things. You will
return with rich fruit and an untroubled Fate.

roll_desc: One Chian, two threes, two fours being cast
text: Approach with courage the business that you set out to do; do it!
You will win, since the gods have given you these favorable
signs, and do not avoid them in your intention: nothing
bad will come from it.

roll_desc: If three ones and two sixes are cast
text: The god announces to you: Undertake with courage the way you set out in your
mind, god will give you everything: you will accomplish
whatever your mind tells you, and Zeus, thundering high,
will be with you as your savior.

roll_desc: If all the threes are cast together
text: The woman who has
given birth to a child, had both breasts dry, but she again
flourished and has milk in abundance. Then you too will
reap the fruits about which you ask me.

entity: Zeus of Hosts and Guests <small>(Zeus Xenios)</small>
roll_desc: A four, a three, a six and two Chians
text: Do not make haste
with the business for which you set out, it is not yet time.
The gods will easily save him who is ill, and the god
announces that he will make an end to the travel of him
who is in foreign land.

roll_desc: One six, three threes and the fifth a Chian
text: The moment
has not yet arrived, you make too much haste. Do not act
in vain, nor like the lion that has borne a blind puppy.
Deliberate calmly, and the god will lead you.

roll_desc: One six, two fours, and a two Chians
text: Why do you hurry?
Wait calmly, the moment has not yet come; if you hurry
without sense and in vain, you pursue something that is
not yet ready. I do not yet see the right moment, but you
will have success when you wait a little while.

roll_desc: One four is cast, the other four are threes
text: Scorpions stand
in your way, do not hurry towards the business that you
intend; wait, and what you wish will arrive later; neither
to buy this nor to sell is better.

roll_desc: Three fours, one Chian, and the fifth a three
text: Do not make
haste; it will not be better to go; when you wish to rush
mindlessly, you will damage yourself very much; but when
you stay put, blameless time will perform everything.

roll_desc: A double six, two Chians and the fifth a three
text: Enter and receive the voice from the
<abbr title="Refers to the traditional seat of the oracle of Apollo at Delphi">tripod</abbr>!
The time is ripe and flourishing; you will marry and return home. You will
achieve whatever you want in your business, having found
the thing about which you are anxious.

roll_desc: A Chian, a six, two threes and the fifth a four
text: I do not see anything painful among the things about which you
ask me; do not think small, go forward with courage; you
will find everything you wish: your vow will be fulfilled,
and there is a perfect occasion for you.

roll_desc: If two fours are cast and three threes
text: Take courage and fight, Zeus the Owner (Ktesios) is your helper.
You wil punish your opponent and have him under your fist, and
he will give happiness to the works for which you will
thank him.

roll_desc: When a single Chian is cast, and the others are fours
text: Now the daimôn will fulfill everything for you and lead you the
right way. You will perform everything according to your
mind, do not wear yourself out anymore. You will achieve
beautifully whatever you desire.

roll_desc: If two sixes, two Chians, and the fifth a four
text: Do your business and undertake it; the time will be favorable. In
the middle, difficulties and danger are waiting. As to
the other oracles, things will turn out well for you.

roll_desc: A Chian and a six, two fours and the fifth a three
text: What you plan will not turn out according to your liking, when
you do it; it is not useful to travel to foreign lands. You
will show no insight if you sell now, nor will it be useful.

roll_desc: If there are three fours and two threes, he signifies this
text: I do not see this plan as safe for you; thus wait. You will
do well, after this there will be luck; as for now remain
calm, trust the gods and stay hopeful.

roll_desc: A six and four threes together; the oracle announces thus
text: Do not make haste, the daimôn is opposed to you, rather
wait and do not act like a dog that gave birth to a blind
litter. Take counsel calmly, and things will turn out happily
for you.

roll_desc: Two sixes, a Chian and two threes; he signifies this
text: Everything about which you ask me is smooth riding for you
and safe; do not be afraid, a daimôn will lead you towards
everything; he will end the painful difficulties and you will
disprove the suspicions.

roll_desc: Three fours, one six, and the fifth a Chian
text: Proceed with courage, the oracle is about hope, stranger; it announces
also that the sick person will be saved. If you need to
consult an oracle, you will receive what you desire.

entity: Hermes Who Brings Gain in Trade
roll_desc: If one three and four fours are cast
text: Zeus will give a good plan to your mind, stranger; thus, all will be well,
undertake what you desire; you will find whatever you ask the oracle
for, and nothing will be bad for you.

roll_desc: Three threes, one six and the fifth a four
text: You pronounce a good oracle, stranger; once you have thought it through,
you will do whatever you desire, and the god will be your
helper; you will win, you will reap the fruits, and you will
achieve everything.

roll_desc: If all four are cast together in the same way
text: The sun has gone down, and terrible night has come, everything has
become dark. Interrupt the matter about which you ask
me; it is neither better to buy nor to sell.

roll_desc: A four and a three, two sixes, and the fifth a Chian
text: Do not undertake this business, stranger; it will not turn out
well for you. The god announces that he will help the one
who is ill; and if there is any fear, nothing bad will happen
to you.

roll_desc: Alone the six, two threes, the others fours
text: A man who makes haste does not achieve what opportunity offers. You
have a profit, and there is fear everywhere because of
evil; your business is ill-fated, and everything is painful;
watch out!

roll_desc: Three sixes and two Chians; he will tell the following
text: It is impossible to do business; do not toil in vain! And do
not turn every stone, lest you chance upon a scorpion.
Fussiness will not bring you luck, be on your guard for
all sorts of misfortune!

roll_desc: A pair of sixes, two fours, the fifth a Chian
text: Everything about which you ask me is on a smooth way for you and
safe; do not be afraid, a daimôn will lead you towards
everything; I see nothing that will bring you harm; take
heart and go forward.

roll_desc: Three fours, one single six, and the fifth a three
text: You will achieve whatever you desire, and you will find whatever
you worry about. Make an attempt, stranger, having taken
heart; everything is ready; you will find what is invisible,
you will come to the day of salvation.

entity: Tyche who Leads to Good Things
roll_desc: When three threes are cast and two sixes, he announces this
text: Your matters are doing well; this oracle tells you to
press forward; you will get away from difficult illness and
master everything, and the god announces that he who is
erring in a foreign land will return.

roll_desc: One Chian, three sixes, the fifth being cast is a three
text: Do not put your hand into a wolf’s mouth, lest some harm
happens to you; the matter about which you ask is difficult
and delicate; but you stay quiet, avoiding travel and
business transactions.

roll_desc: If all that are cast are fours, but the fifth is a six, he announces this
text: Throwing seeds and writing letters on the
sea are both pointless toil and fruitless doing; since you
are mortal, do not force a god who might harm you.

roll_desc: Four and two threes, two sixes, and he announces this
text: Do not undertake the travel that you intend, stranger! Nobody
will do it. A large fiery lion is about, against whom you
have to be on your guard, a terrible one. The oracle is
untractable, wait quietly.

roll_desc: One Chian, three sixes, and the fifth a four
text: Honor Pallas Athena, and you will get everything, whatever you wish,
and everything which you are planning will turn out well;
she will free from bonds and will save the sick person.

roll_desc: If two sixes are cast and two fours, and the fifth is a three
text: Sail, wherever you want, you will return home again,
having found and done everything according to your
wish; you will achieve everything, and thus to buy and to
trade is happiness.

roll_desc: If three sixes and two threes are being cast, he signifies this
text: Stay put, do not act, obey Phoibos’ oracles. With time,
you will find an occasion, but for now stay quiet. If you
wait a short while you will achieve everything, whatever
you desire.

roll_desc: Three fours, two sixes; the god announces this to you
text: Stay at home with your possessions and do not go somewhere
else, lest a terrible monster and a revengeful demon
approach you. I do not see this business as reliable and
safe.

roll_desc: One four being cast, three sixes and the fifth a three
text: Take courage; you have an opportunity; you will achieve
what you desire, and you will come upon the right time
to begin your travel; your toil will have its chance; it is
good to engage in work, competition and litigation.

roll_desc: Four sixes, the fifth a Chian: he signifies this
text: As wolves overpower sheep and powerful lions overpower broad-hoofed
oxen, so you too will master all this, and everything
about which you ask will be yours, with the help of
Zeus’ son Hermes.

roll_desc: When three sixes and two fours, the oracle announces
text: The business has its obstacles, do not make haste, but
wait; there is a road, painful, impossible and not to be
approached; to buy is difficult and to sell brings loss.

roll_desc: Four sixes, the three alone: he signifies this to you
text: The daughter of Uranus, Aphrodite, the mighty mistress of the
Erotes, sends a good oracle, she will grant travel to you;
you will escape from sickness and vainglorious thoughts.

roll_desc: Four sixes, a four: he signifies this
text: It is impossible to undertake
something in vain; do not in vain toil uselessly, lest
you incur damage by pressing on. It is not good to begin
travelling nor doing business.

roll_desc: If all that are cast together are sixes
text: Do not go, wherever
you intend to; it will be better for you to stay; I see
something hostile to you, thus wait; afterwards, it will
be possible, and (the god) will free you from fear and save
you from toil.
